verses.verse: I therefore, <WG3767> the prisoner <WG1198> of the Lord, <WG2962> beseech <WG3870> you that you walk <WG4043> worthy <WG516> of the vocation <WG2821> with which <WG3739> you are called, <WG2564>
With all <WG3956> lowliness <WG5012> and meekness, <WG4236> with long-suffering, <WG3115> forbearing <WG430> one <WG240> another <WG240> in love; <WG26>
Endeavoring <WG4704> to keep <WG5083> the unity <WG1775> of the Spirit <WG4151> in the bond <WG4886> of peace. <WG1515>
There is one <WG1520> body, <WG4983> and one <WG1520> Spirit, <WG4151> even <WG2532> as you are called <WG2564> in one <WG3391> hope <WG1680> of your <WG5216> calling; <WG2821>
One <WG1520> Lord, <WG2962> one <WG1520> faith, <WG4102> one <WG3391> baptism, <WG908>
One <WG1520> God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> of all, <WG3956> who <WG3588> is above <WG1909> all, <WG3956> and through <WG1223> all, <WG3956> and in you all. <WG3956>
But to every <WG1538> one <WG1520> of us is given <WG1325> grace <WG5485> according <WG2596> to the measure <WG3358> of the gift <WG1431> of Christ. <WG5547>
Why <WG1352> he said, <WG3004> When he ascended <WG305> up on <WG5311> high, <WG5311> he led <WG162> captivity <WG161> captive, <WG162> and gave <WG1325> gifts <WG1390> to men. <WG444>
(Now <WG1161> that he ascended, <WG305> what <WG5101> is it but that he also <WG2532> descended <WG2597> first <WG4412> into <WG1519> the lower <WG2737> parts <WG3313> of the earth? <WG1093>
He that descended <WG2597> is the same <WG846> also <WG2532> that ascended <WG305> up far <WG5231> above <WG5231> all <WG3956> heavens, <WG3772> that he might fill <WG4137> all <WG3956> things.)
And he gave <WG1325> some, <WG3588> apostles; <WG652> and some, <WG3588> prophets; <WG4396> and some, <WG3588> evangelists; <WG2099> and some, <WG3588> pastors <WG4166> and teachers; <WG1320>
For the perfecting <WG2677> of the saints, <WG40> for the work <WG2041> of the ministry, <WG1248> for the edifying <WG3619> of the body <WG4983> of Christ: <WG5547>

Till <WG3360> we all <WG3956> come <WG2658> in the unity <WG1775> of the faith, <WG4102> and of the knowledge <WG1922> of the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> to a perfect <WG5046> man, <WG435> to the measure <WG3358> of the stature <WG2244> of the fullness <WG4138> of Christ: <WG5547>

That we from now on <WG3063> be no <WG3371> more <WG2001> children, <WG3516> tossed <WG2831> to and fro, <WG2831> and carried <WG4064> about <WG4064> with every <WG3956> wind <WG417> of doctrine, <WG1319> by the sleight <WG2940> of men, <WG444> and cunning craftiness, <WG3834> whereby <WG4314> they lie <WG3180> in wait <WG3180> to deceive; <WG4106>
But speaking <WG226> the truth <WG226> in love, <WG26> may grow <WG837> up into <WG1519> him in all <WG3956> things, which <WG3739> is the head, <WG2776> even Christ: <WG5547>

From whom <WG3739> the whole <WG3956> body <WG4983> fitly <WG4883> joined <WG4883> together <WG4883> and compacted <WG4822> by that which every <WG3956> joint <WG860> supplies, <WG2024> according <WG2596> to the effectual <WG1753> working <WG1753> in the measure <WG3358> of every <WG1520> <WG1538> part, <WG3313> makes <WG4160> increase <WG838> of the body <WG4983> to the edifying <WG3619> of itself <WG1438> in love. <WG26>

This <WG5124> I say <WG3004> therefore, <WG3767> and testify <WG3143> in the Lord, <WG2962> that you from now on <WG3371> walk <WG4043> not as other <WG3062> Gentiles <WG1484> walk, <WG4043> in the vanity <WG3153> of their mind, <WG3563>

Having the understanding <WG1271> darkened, <WG4654> being <WG5607> alienated <WG526> from the life <WG2222> of God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the ignorance <WG52> that is in them, because <WG1223> of the blindness <WG4457> of their heart: <WG2588>

Who <WG3748> being past <WG524> feeling <WG524> have given <WG3860> themselves <WG1438> over <WG3860> to lasciviousness, <WG766> to work <WG2039> all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167> with greediness. <WG4124>
But you have not so <WG3779> learned <WG3129> Christ; <WG5547>
If <WG1489> so <WG3779> be that you have heard <WG191> him, and have been taught <WG1321> by him, as the truth <WG225> is in Jesus: <WG2424>

That you put <WG659> off <WG659> concerning <WG2596> the former <WG4387> conversation <WG391> the old <WG3820> man, <WG444> which <WG3588> is corrupt <WG5351> according <WG2596> to the deceitful <WG539> lusts; <WG1939>
And be renewed <WG365> in the spirit <WG4151> of your <WG5216> mind; <WG3563>

And that you put <WG1746> on <WG1746> the new <WG2537> man, <WG444> which <WG3588> after <WG2596> God <WG2316> is created <WG2936> in righteousness <WG1343> and true <WG3588> <WG225> holiness. <WG3742>

Why <WG1352> putting <WG659> away <WG659> lying, <WG5579> speak <WG2980> every <WG1520> <WG1538> man truth <WG226> with his neighbor: <WG4139> for we are members <WG3196> one <WG240> of another. <WG240>
Be you angry, <WG3710> and sin <WG264> not: let not the sun <WG2246> go <WG1931> down <WG1931> on your <WG5216> wrath: <WG3950>
Neither <WG3383> give <WG1325> place <WG5117> to the devil. <WG1228>

Let him that stole <WG2813> steal <WG2813> no <WG3371> more: <WG2001> but rather <WG3123> let him labor, <WG2872> working <WG2038> with his hands <WG5495> the thing which is good, <WG18> that he may have <WG2192> to give <WG3330> to him that needs. <WG5532>

Let no <WG3956> <WG3361> corrupt <WG4550> communication <WG3056> proceed <WG1607> out of your <WG5216> mouth, <WG4750> but that which <WG1536> is good <WG18> to the use <WG5532> of edifying, <WG3619> that it may minister <WG1325> grace <WG5485> to the hearers. <WG191>
And grieve <WG3076> not the holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> of God, <WG2316> whereby <WG1722> <WG3739> you are sealed <WG4972> to the day <WG2250> of redemption. <WG629>
Let all <WG3956> bitterness, <WG4088> and wrath, <WG2372> and anger, <WG3709> and clamor, <WG2906> and evil <WG988> speaking, <WG988> be put <WG142> away from you, with all <WG3956> malice: <WG2549>

And be you kind <WG5543> one <WG240> to another, <WG240> tenderhearted, <WG2155> forgiving <WG5483> one <WG1438> another, <WG1438> even <WG2532> as God <WG2316> for Christ's <WG5547> sake <WG1722> has forgiven <WG5483> you.
